skins.shipDescription: Le Fantasque-class destroyer C Le Malin.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Le Malin, Le Fantasque-class destroyer of the Vichya Dominion. I once fought alongside my friends of the 8th Light Division in Brest. After that, Le Triomphant went down a different path... Well, we don't hold it against each other.
skins.acquisition: I am the mirage that chases the waves, the poisoned blade that protects the Vichya Dominion. Super Destroyer, Le Malin, is yours to command.
skins.login: Destroyer, Le Malin, is ready to take your orders at any time... *yaawnn*...
skins.details: *Yawn*... Sleepy... I wanna go roll around in bed... Zzzzz... Geh?! Wh-what is it?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Without firepower, speed alone is not enough to defeat the enemy. That goes without saying.
skins.secretaryIdle2: So bored... maybe it's time to quit... Gah! I didn't say anything!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Dunkerque's handmade sweets... Guhehe... Ah, I mustn't! I'm still at work...!
skins.secretaryTouch: Being elegant... isn't worth the effort... Geh?! Wh-what do you want?!

skins.shipDescription: Morning, Commander~ Mm, the Sabbath is the day of rest, so I shall not budge from my sacred charge even if you were to call Triomphant over. I solemnly swear to do absolutely nothing today.
skins.acquisition: Morning, Commander~ Mm, the Sabbath is the day of rest, so I shall not budge from my sacred charge even if you were to call Triomphant over. I solemnly swear to do absolutely nothing today.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Tired... Don't wanna work... Commander, don't call for me even if you have something that needs doing...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ahem! Commander, I brought coffee! N-no way! How'd you figure out that I slipped cold medication into it...?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I don't wanna do any more work todayyy... Commander, let's hurry up and take a break already~! Right! Now!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hyah?! ...Jeez, what are you doing! Just when I was about to fall asleep...

skins.JPClientName: Lれ家の マルコディ
skins.shipDescription: I must commend you for being able to find my secret base, Commander... but unfortunately for you, I refuse to return to the office today. Just... *yawn*...let me spend the whole day sleeping here...
skins.acquisition: I must commend you for being able to find my secret base, Commander... but unfortunately for you, I refuse to return to the office today. Just... *yawn*...let me spend the whole day sleeping here...
skins.details: This hammock feels pretty nice, but I can't roll around... A tactical failure...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Too bad you can't turn into an air conditioner, Commander... Otherwise, I'd cling to you all day... Zzzzzz...
skins.secretaryIdle2: In any case, Le Malin will now go take a most elegant nap. Don't bother me even if there's something that needs doing... and save me some Cola and snacks... Zzzzzz...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Who's that over there? ...Le Terrible?! C-c-c-commander! Hide me! If that girl finds me, I'm not gonna be able to sleep the day away!
skins.secretaryTouch: Swim? Hehehe, not to brag or anything, but I'll show you the most elegant way to float!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I'm too slovenly...? Meh, haven't you already known that for ages~?
